channel.title: How do i change the enegry thing to coordinates
channel.description: Where it says How much enegry left i want it to be coordinates. im using deltascape source anyone know how to do this?

item.title: How do i change the enegry thing to coordinates
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You should be able to type ::mypos here is the command for it

} else if (command.startsWith("mypos")) { sendMessage("You are standing on X=" + absX + " Y=" + absY);

You will need to edit it for Delta.

And if you want it where the energy isâ€¦

declare

    public void writeCoords() {
        try {
            sendQuest("X: " + absX + " Y: " + absY, 149);
            sendQuest("Your coordinates", 148);
        } catch (Exception e) {
            println_debug("Error");
        }
    }[/code]

and add this in process()

[code]writeCoords();

You will also need to delete or edit some of the code to be fixed with DeltaScape.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the enegry thing to coordinates
